title: Pain au Chocolat Pudding
ingredients: ['200g Pain au Chocolat (fresh or otherwise)', '10g soft Butter or good quality Margarine', '2 Eggs', '175 ml milk (semi-skimmed or full-fat)', '40 ml Double Cream', '30g Caster Sugar', 'Grated Zest of 1/2 a Lemon', 'Whole Nutmeg for grinding', 'Handful of Sultanas (optional)']
